CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(b3d__Removed_At__c)), "Removed", IF( NOT(ISBLANK(b3d__Resolved_At__c)), "Resolved", IF( NOT(ISBLANK(b3d__Unlinked_At__c)), "Unlinked", IF( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(b3d__Suggestion_State__c))), TEXT(b3d__Suggestion_State__c), "New" ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Thread Status
